document_data.name: The Belled Boot
document_data.mainbody: '''The Belled Boot''' was a toy store in [[Reddansyr]] in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The toy store sat in the intersection of [[Bright Lane]] and [[Selver Street]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The store owner was [[Telgerd Belvrost]] as of {{yearlink|1370}}.
